 A specialized lemma for set theory (ordered pair theorem).  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 8-Dec-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2015.)
statement:
oplem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) $.
oplem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th \/ ta ) ) $.
oplem1.3 $e |- ( ps <-> th ) $.
oplem1.4 $e |- ( ch -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
oplem1 $p |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
